scenes.description: The 'Cellmate's in Love' segment continues with the 'Heart-stirring line' challenge where Bachelor Number 4, Steve (Shiori), delivers a romantic speech to a blindfolded Nerissa.
The game transitions to the 'Love Crisis' round, where the contestants must apologize to Nerissa after a hypothetical two-year relationship dispute.
